message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. This unique opportunity is valued at $1200000, reflecting its exceptional quality and value. To make this proposition attractive, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1100000. This is an exclusive chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $1100000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to pay closer to $1000000.  This would be a win-win situation for both of us, as it gives me a good deal and still ensures you make a profit. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your offer, I am pleased to counter with a price of $1050000. This reflects a fair compromise, providing you with a substantial discount while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and we can move forward towards a successful transaction.
